snippet.title: Short Circuit Walkthrough, ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
A walkthrough of the ZX Spectrum game, Short Circuit. There are two parts to this game, but the "game completed" and "congratulations" messages appear at the end of part 1. There's no ending to part 2 - it just keeps going until you die. From the recording originally sent to http://www.rzxarchive.co.uk/

#ZXSpectrum #RetroGaming #Walkthrough
